author: IGN
description:
An all-new way to escape Walton City is coming. Check out the latest Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days trailer for this side-scrolling shelter survival game to see what's coming with the Spill Zone update, which also features new NPCs, survivors, and districts to explore. It’s not just the undead players will have to contend with, there is also a toxic gas threatening to suffocate the life from unwitting survivors. Into the Dead: Our Darkest is available now on PC in Early Access via Steam, and the Spill Zone update will be available on September 22, 2025.

Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days is a side-scrolling shelter survival game that transports players to Texas, 1980 at the height of summer during the outbreak of a deadly apocalypse. Lead a group of desperate survivors from shelter to shelter as they attempt to escape Walton City before it is overrun. Scavenge, craft, fight, and plan your next move — and try not to lose yourself along the way.
title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days - Official Spill Zone Early Access Update Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Class Updates Developer Overview Trailer for Diablo 4, the hit action RPG developed by Blizzard Entertainment. Get the rundown on the updates to the core game as it pertains to the game's Classes coming with the Season of Infernal Chaos. Adjustments to Rogue, Spiritborn, and more will be introduced with the Season of Infernal Chaos in Diablo 4 on September 23 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Diablo 4 - Official Class Updates Developer Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Renown Early Access launch trailer for this upcoming medieval multiplayer survival experience set in a vast, ever-evolving world. Whether alone or rallying allies, gather resources, build powerful strongholds, and engage in brutal battles for dominance. Renown will be available in Steam Early Access on September 22, 2025.
title: Renown - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get a deep dive into the factions of Endless Legend 2 in this gameplay overview trailer for the upcoming fantasy 4X strategy game. Endless Legend 2 will be available in Early Access on PC (Steam and PC Game Pass) on September 22, 2025.
title: Endless Legend 2 - Official Faction Asymmetry Trailer

author: IGN
description: Revelation of Decay is a pixel-art sandbox survival game set in a collapsing, zombie-infested world. It mixes scavenging, building, exploration and combat. Recruit NPC companions, capture zombies to power your base, and confront bizarre creatures as you travel through biomes. Revelation of Decay will be available on PC in 2026.
title: Revelation of Decay - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the 'Batman Day 2025' Behind the Scenes Featurette for LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight, an upcoming action-adventure LEGO game developed by TT Games and Warner Bros. Games. Players can hear from the likes of James Gunn, Jim Lee, and more at DC Studios alongside the Head of Development at TT Games, Jonathan Smith, on the process of bringing the iconic hero to the world of LEGO once more. Alongside the upcoming game, hear from DC icons on how Batman's 86-year history has touched fans across all mediums, from comics, movies, and video games. LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight - Official 'Batman Day 2025' Behind the Scenes Clip

author: IGN
description:
In this special episode of Devs React to Speedruns, two members of the Iron Galaxy team sit down to watch speedrunners take on their game. Founder Dave Lang and Game Director Kurt Tillmanns provide real-time commentary as they have their minds blown by speedrunners Sawwl and Fnrakie.

author: IGN
description:
Check out 24 minutes of developer-led gameplay showcasing the Necrophage faction in action from Endless Legend 2 in this exclusive video. Join community developer Sergio De La Calle and game director Derek Paxton at developer Amplitude Studios to see gameplay as they give a walkthrough and dive into the Necrophage faction, how the Necrophage work, how combat differs from the first game, and more insight into the turn-based 4X strategy game's wider design. Endless Legend 2 will be available on PC in Early Access on September 22, 2025.

#IGN
title: Endless Legend 2 - 24 Minutes of Necrophage Developer Gameplay Overview

author: IGN
description:
One Battle After Another cast members Leonardo DiCaprio, Benicio Del Toro, Regina Hall, Teyana Taylor, and Chase Infiniti share their thoughts on what makes Paul Thomas Anderson such a unique director and their favorite moments from his past films, including Boogie Nights, Magnolia and The Master. 

One Battle After Another opens in theaters on VistaVision, 70mm film and IMAX nationwide on September 26, 2025, and internationally beginning 24 September 2025.

#IGN #onebattleafteranothermovie
title: One Battle After Another Stars on Paul Thomas Anderson's Best Movies

author: IGN
description:
What goes up must come down, and in the case of Skate, coming down can be very hard. Check out some of our biggest fails, spills, and bails from Skate. 
Gameplay captured on PC with with an RTX 4090 and all graphics settings set to their highest values.
title: Our Biggest Bails and Goofiest Fails In Skate

author: IGN
description:
In this clip, we break down whether the Switch 2 is off to a good start, from its first wave of exclusive games to Nintendo’s pricing strategy and what it all means for fans heading into 2025.

#NintendoSwitch2 #Nintendo #Gaming #IGN
title: Is Nintendo Switch 2 Off to a Good Start? - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Hollow Knight: Silksong’s Bilewater is a terrible swamp location. Whether you just got here or you’ve been stuck bashing your head against the wall in this place, we’ve got tips to help you know when you should tackle this putrid area, how to find Shakra for the Bilewater map, how to find a hidden Bilewater bench and more. Here’s how to make your time in Bilewater less awful.

Check out our expanding wiki for more help with collectibles, bosses, exploration and much more.
https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

10:19 - The Best Run Back to the Bilehaven Boss Fight (Groal)

#IGN #gaming
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - How to Make It Through Bilewater

author: IGN
description: Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week Daemon, Logan, Max, and Ryan look back at the Nintendo Switch 2's first hundred days. The system is Nintendo's fastest-selling to date, with strong third-party support and a slate of upcoming first-party titles that should sustain the console's momentum through the holidays. But Nintendo has raised eyebrows with their game pricing strategy ($80 for Mario Kart World is nuts), and the tariff situation in the United States could threaten to slow down the Switch 2's impressive sales pace. Plus we have last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.
title: Nintendo Switch 2’s First 100 Days Report Card - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Check out Super Sonic and Hatsune Miku gameplay from Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds. To quote our review thats linked below "Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds fires on all cylinders with a fantastic roster, excellent courses, and lengthy list of customization options." Gameplay captured on PS5. Gotta go fast!

Check out the review here - https://www.ign.com/games/sonic-racing-crossworlds
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Blazing Fast Super Sonic and Hatsune Miku Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
If you like this video and would like to see more like it, make sure to subscribe to Eurogamer on YouTube. 
Despite the power of PS5 Pro and new graphics cards, why are so many trailers, such as GTA 6 and Ghost of Yotei, captured on the base PS5? And why are developers treating the base PS5 as the target spec for everything? Even traditionally PC-focused studios like CD Projekt Red, with their recent tech demo of The Witcher 4
Aiming just below the maximum keeps expectations in check and reassures us that our hardware will still be good in two years time. And in an era of rising inflation and endless financial turmoil, that's more valuable to the games industry than the impending generational shift to PS6.
This video was created by Jim Trinca and was originally featured on Eurogamer.
title: GTA 6 and Witcher 4 Prove the Console Wars Are Over, Base PS5 Won.

author: IGN
title: HIDDEN Akaza details in Demon Slayer

author: IGN
description:
Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds reviewed by Jada Griffin on PlayStation 5, also available on Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is firing on all cylinders with a fantastic roster of 24 of my favorite hedgehogs, foxes, echidnas, and more. The tracks are the best designed selection we've ever gotten in any Sonic racing game, and there is a generationally great soundtrack to accompany them. The racing itself feels fast, fantastic, and intuitive, with lots of options to tweak your stats to your preferred playstyle. There are plenty of modes that entertained my friends and me for hours – though I do wish it had the option for splitscreen when playing online. The titular Crossworld mechanic is a fantastic idea that keeps each race fresh, and a great way to potentially turn the tables on opponents thanks to a lengthy list of customization options. Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is one that I know I'll enjoy playing plenty more of in the months to come, crossing the fin
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Review
